Name: Translation
Description: A translation is any adaptation of a work in one language to another language.

Properties.Name: Date of Translation
Properties.Description: The date, if known, that the translation was completed.

Properties.Name: Target language
Properties.Description: The language that the work was translated INTO.

Properties.Name: Translator
Properties.Description: The person(s) or company that made the translation; this property assumes a person - if it is a company, please edit the company after you click "save" and remove "person" from its list of types.
